title: Niches for transformative change within dominant territorial pathways: Practices and perspectives in a Nicaraguan agricultural frontier
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 87

Author(s): Milagros Romero, Pierre Merlet, Nadège Garambois, Frédéric Huybrechs, Isaline Reguer, Florian Vigroux, María Cordero-Fernández, Johan Bastiaensen
